attributes.action: Bring in Dog Owner Licences instead of banning American Bully breeds
attributes.additional_details: There are many bullies being bred in the UK for the wrong reasons, but there are still thousands of bully dogs that are perfect family companions and these intelligent dogs can be easily well trained, and should not be punished or put down just because of the bad reputation. The owners need to be held accountable for training and the breed should not be banned, the owners should be assessed on a case by case basis
attributes.background: The government should bring in Licences for dog owners, as opposed to punishing the breed for poor behaviour/lack of training.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar actions:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Bring back a Dog Licence:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650
